news.title: What do Putin and Trump each want from summit in Alaska?
news.summary: The Russian leader senses a chance for more international recognition, while his American counterpart hopes to play peacemaker.

news.title: Man accused of driving car into Liverpool FC parade crowd faces 24 new charges
news.summary: Paul Doyle became tearful as he was asked to confirm his identity at Liverpool Crown Court.

news.title: Second MasterChef contestant edited out of scandal-hit series
news.summary: The show's production company says another chef decided not to be included "given recent events".

news.title: Faisal Islam: Are latest UK growth figures good or bad news for the economy?
news.summary: Depending on the timeframe you look at, the GDP figures can be seen as glass half full or half empty.

news.title: Hospital treatments failing to meet demand, say experts
news.summary: A small rise in the NHS backlog prompts questions about how well ministers are doing on improving waits.

news.title: Israeli settlement plans will 'bury' idea of Palestinian state, minister says
news.summary: Far-right Israeli minister Bezalel Smotrich announced approval for 3,401 new homes in the controversial E1 area project in the occupied West Bank.

news.title: Burial 'fat tax' on wider plots at council cemetery criticised
news.summary: The move at a Wolverhampton cemetery is due to high obesity rates, a council says.

news.title: EU sending wildfire help to Spain as death toll rises
news.summary: Spain has activated an EU disaster assistance mechanism for fires for the first time ever.

news.title: Neighbours star Stefan Dennis joins Strictly line-up
news.summary: Dennis, a long-serving cast member in the Australian TV soap, was added to the line-up for Strictly's 23rd series.

news.title: Full guide to A-level results day - and grade boundaries explained
news.summary: A guide to your options if you are not happy with your A-level results.
